Method Detail

equals

public static final boolean equals(String strA,
                                   String strB,
                                   boolean caseSensitive)
Compares the two given strings in a case sensitive or insensitive manner depending on the caseSensitive parameter.

Parameters:
strA - The first string
strB - The second string
caseSensitive - Whether case matters in the comparison
Returns:
true if the two strings are equal
